    Download Arques v1.0.15 (latest)
    or
    View on GitHub
    Your help will affect its evolution

    ArquesElement()

    new ArquesElement()

    Do not use ArquesElement directly. Instead, use global E() function to create ArquesElement object. Arques manages ArquesElement object automatically.
    ArquesElement is the core class of Arques having convenient methods for improving productivity.

    Members

    Count

    length :integer

    [Get] number of DOM element. One ArquesElement object can contain multiple DOM elements. Use count property to get number of children elements.

    readonly count :integer

    [Get] number of children.

    Hierarchy

    first :ArquesElement

    [Get/Set] the first child

    last :ArquesElement

    [Get/Set] the last child

    parent :ArquesElement

    [Get/Set] parent.

    children :Array.<ArquesElement>

    [Get/Set] children list.

    Location

    x :integer|string

    [Get/Set] x position. This works only for absolute or relatvie position of css.

    y :integer|string

    [Get/Set] y position. This works only for absolute or relatvie position of css.

    cx :integer|string

    [Get/Set] center x position. This works only for absolute or relatvie position of css.

    cy :integer|string

    [Get/Set] center y position. This works only for absolute or relatvie position of css.

    z :integer

    [Get/Set] zIndex.

    Translation

    tx :float

    [Get/Set] translation on the x axis.

    ty :float

    [Get/Set] translation on the y axis.

    tz :float

    [Get/Set] translation on the z axis.

    Size

    w :integer|string

    [Get/Set] width.

    h :integer|string

    [Get/Set] height.

    Location

    l :integer

    [Get/Set] left (= x position).

    t :integer

    [Get/Set] top (= y position).

    r :integer

    [Get/Set] css right.

    b :integer

    [Get/Set] css bottom.

    Point

    point :P

    [Get/Set] x, y, z points. Use global P(x, y, [z]) functions to specify the point.

    Frame

    frame :R

    [Get/Set] frame. Use global R(x, y, w, h) or RR(l, t, r, b) functions to specify the frame.

    readonly frameP :R

    [Get] frame adding padding.

    readonly frameM :R

    [Get] frame adding margin.

    readonly frameMP :R

    [Get] frame adding margin and padding.

    Min/Max

    minw :integer|string

    [Get/Set] min width.

    minh :integer|string

    [Get/Set] min height.

    maxw :integer|string

    [Get/Set] max width.

    maxh :integer|string

    [Get/Set] max height.

    Transform

    transform :string

    [Get/Set] css transform.

    Animation

    aniFunc :string

    [Get/Set] css transition-timing-function.

    aniTime :float|string

    [Get/Set] css animationDuration as milliseconds.

    transTime :float|string

    [Get/Set] css transitionDuration as milliseconds.

    transDelay :float|string

    [Get/Set] css transitionDelay as milliseconds.

    transProp :float|string

    [Get/Set] css transitionProperty.

    trans :float|string

    [Get/Set] css transition.

    Angle

    angleUnit :ArquesElement

    [Get/Set] angle unit. Specify ar.DEGREE or ar.RADIAN.

    Spin

    spin :float

    [Get/Set] spin angle.

    spinX :float

    [Get/Set] spin angle on the x axis.

    spinY :float

    [Get/Set] spin angle on the y axis.

    spinZ :float

    [Get/Set] spin angle on the z axis.

    Scale

    scale :float

    [Get/Set] scale.

    scaleX :float

    [Get/Set] scale on the x axis.

    scaleY :float

    [Get/Set] scale on the y axis.

    scaleZ :float

    [Get/Set] scale on the z axis.

    Skew

    skew :float

    [Get/Set] skew angle.

    skewX :float

    [Get/Set] skew on the x axis.

    skewY :float

    [Get/Set] skew on the y axis.

    Flip

    flipX :boolean

    [Get/Set] flip on the x axis.

    flipY :boolean

    [Get/Set] flip on the y axis.

    Margin

    margin :integer|string

    [Get/Set] margin.

    ml :integer|string

    [Get/Set] margin left.

    mt :integer|string

    [Get/Set] margin top.

    mr :integer|string

    [Get/Set] margin right.

    mb :integer|string

    [Get/Set] margin bottom.

    Padding

    padding :integer|string

    [Get/Set] padding.

    pl :integer|string

    [Get/Set] padding left (pl = (p)adding + (l)eft).

    pt :integer|string

    [Get/Set] padding top (pt = (p)adding + (t)op).

    pr :integer|string

    [Get/Set] padding right (pr = (p)adding + (r)ight).

    pb :integer|string

    [Get/Set] padding bottom (pb = (p)adding + (b)ottom).

    border :integer|string

    [Get/Set] border.

    bdl :integer|string

    [Get/Set] border left ((bdl = (b)or(d)er + (l)eft)).

    bdt :integer|string

    [Get/Set] border top (bdt = (b)or(d)er + (t)op).

    bdr :integer|string

    [Get/Set] border right (bdr = (b)or(d)er + (r)ight).

    bdb :integer|string

    [Get/Set] border bottom (border(bd) + bottom(b)).

    lh :integer|string

    [Get/Set] line height (lh = (l)ine + (h)eight).

    sizing :string

    [Get/Set] box-sizing.

    Scroll

    sl :integer

    [Get/Set] scroll left (sl = (s)croll (l)eft).

    st :integer

    [Get/Set] scroll top (st = (s)croll (t)op).

    readonly sw :integer

    [Get] scroll width (sw = (s)croll (w)idth).

    readonly sh :integer

    [Get] scroll height (sh = (s)croll (h)eight).

    onScroll :integer

    [Get/Set] onScroll.

    Offset

    readonly ot :integer

    [Get] offset top (ot = (o)ffset (t)op).

    readonly ol :integer

    [Get] offset left (ol = (o)ffset (l)eft).

    readonly ow :integer

    [Get] offset width (ow = (o)ffset (w)idth).

    readonly oh :integer

    [Get] offset height (oh = (o)ffset (h)eight).

    Overflow

    overflow

    [Get/Set] overflow.

    ox

    [Get/Set] overflow-x.

    oy

    [Get/Set] overflow-y.

    Visibility

    display :string

    [Get/Set] display.

    visible :boolean|string

    [Get/Set] visibility.

    position :string

    [Get/Set] position. Set one of static | absolute | fixed | relative | sticky | initial | inherit.

    float :string

    [Get/Set] cssFloat. Set one of left | right | none | initial | inherit.

    Background

    background :string

    [Get/Set] background.

    bi :string

    [Get/Set] background image (bi = (b)ackground (i)mage).

    bs :string

    [Get/Set] background size (bs = (b)ackground (s)ize).

    bc :string

    [Get/Set] background color (bc = (b)ackground (c)olor).

    fill :string

    [Get/Set] fill color.

    alpha :float

    [Get/Set] opacity.

    Font

    fc :string

    [Get/Set] font color (fc = (f)ont (c)olor).

    fs :integer

    [Get/Set] font size (fs = (f)ont (s)ize).

    ff :string

    [Get/Set] font family (ff = (f)ont (f)amily).

    fw :string

    [Get/Set] font weight (fw = (f)ont (w)eight).

    Etc

    filter :string

    [Get/Set] filter.

    alignX :string

    [Get/Set] text align. Set one of ar.LEFT | ar.CENTER | ar.RIGHT

    alignY :string

    [Get/Set] text align. Set one of ar.TOP | ar.CENTER | ar.BOTTOM

    cursor :string

    [Get/Set] Cursor.

    zoom :float

    [Get/Set] zoom.

    sel :string

    [Get/Set] User selection. Set one of 'auto' | 'text' | 'none' | 'contain' | 'all'

    drag :string

    [Get/Set] User drag. Set one of 'auto' | 'element' | 'none'

    cls :string

    [Get/Set] class.

    html :string

    [Get/Set] inner html.

    val :string

    [Get/Set] value.

    checked :boolean

    [Get/Set] checked.

    focused :boolean

    [Get/Set] focused.

    readonly tag :string

    [Get] the tag name.

    readonly enabled :boolean

    [Get/Set] enabled.

    Methods

    free()

    Removes DOM object from its parent and unset all event handlers. Use this method for memory management and improving performance.

    Returns:
    -

    N/A

    Example
    <script src="arques.js"></script>

<div>
<div id="my_id" style="position:absolute;">Free?! No way!</div>
</div>

<script>
var a = E('my_id'); 
a.free(); // this will remove "my_id" div from its parent.
</script>

    add(obj)

    Add child element.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    obj E_or_DOM

    object

    insert(index, obj)

    Insert child element.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    index integer

    index to be inserted
    obj E_or_DOM

    object

    del(obj)

    Delete child element.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    obj E_or_DOM

    object

    clear()

    Delete all child elements.

    indexOf()

    Finds the index of the specified element.

    E(id) → {ArquesElement}

    Finds child element.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    id string

    Element id
    Returns:
    ArquesElement -

    ArquesElement object

    Example
    <script src="arques.js"></script>

<div id="parent_id">
 <div id="child_id">
  Cool!
 </div>
</div>

<script>
var parent = E('parent_id'); 
var child = parent.E('child_id'); 

ar.log(child.html); // this will print "Cool!" in console. 
</script>

    se(isHorizontal)

    Scroll to the end(scroll(s) to the end(e)).

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    isHorizontal boolean

    hide()

    Hides element. (runs display = none)

    show(type)

    Shows element. (runs display = 'block', visibility = 'visible')

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    type string

    Specify a display type. The default is 'block' if it's not given.

    isShowing() → {boolean}

    Runs animation.

    Returns:
    boolean -

    Tells if it's visible. (this.display != 'none' && this.visible != 'hidden')

    addCls(className)

    Add class.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    className string

    A class name to be added.

    delCls(className)

    Delete class.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    className string

    A class name to be deleted.

    on(key, cb, isUseNativeopt)

    Sets an event handler

    Parameters:
    Name Type Attributes Description
    key string

    javascript event name
    cb function

    callback
    isUseNative string <optional>

    Specify whether using centralized event controller or javascript native event. Please remind that native event uses more resources and can cause performance issue.

    off(key, cbopt, isUseNativeopt)

    Unsets an event handler

    Parameters:
    Name Type Attributes Description
    key string

    javascript event name
    cb function <optional>

    callback
    isUseNative string <optional>

    Specify whether using centralized event controller or javascript native event. Please remind that native event uses more resources and can cause performance issue.

    attr(key, valueopt)

    [Get/Set] attribute of DOM object.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Attributes Description
    key string

    attribute name
    value string <optional>

    attribute value to set

    enable()

    Enables element. The element will accept centralized events if it's enabled

    disable()

    Disables element. The element will not accept centralized events if it's disabled

    isEnabled()

    Tells if the element is enabled.

    ani(name, cb)

    Runs animation.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    name string

    animation name (please refer to https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/ for the name)
    cb function

    Callback is called as soon as the animation is finished.
    NHN Entertainment. Frontend Development Lab
